Our Principles

Fair, Easy & Free

FairSwap is enabling a simple exchange of goods, time and currencies for everyone.

The Next-Level Marketplace

For everyone, by everyone

No third party is involved in transactions. Its always from the user to the user wiht no additional transaction fees.

A marketplace for everything

FairSwap enables secure exchange of goods, services and digital currencies.

The antidote to complexity

FairSwap simplifies the economy, making it inclusive and easy to use for everyone. A secure, unique architecture gets rid of complexity, intermediaries and fee structures.

You own what is yours

No party, provider or intermediary can ever access user funds or data without user consent.

Read our Whitepaper

Built on Crystal Twin

Crystal Twin is the all-in-one storage, identity and and security solution. Each user is the sole owner of their data and can choose people and corporations to share their data revocably.

About Crystal Twin
